title: Startup founder Charlie Javice found guilty of defrauding JPMorgan Chase in $175 million deal
description: The Justice Department had charged Javice with four crimes including wire and bank fraud, counts which carry multi-decade maximum sentences

title: Columbia U Interim Leader Steps Down Amid Trump’s Attacks
